If you think working as a game developer (artist, programmer, designer, whatever) is just playing games all day and getting paid, you are sorely mistaken. Also, the industry is neither "star-studded" nor specially "fabulous". I'm not saying it's a bad business - not at all - but that it might not be what you think it is.

Misleading titles and blatant pitching of a book with clearly bullshit claims like this is just... lame.

Mind you, I don't know the contents of this torrent, so I'm not saying you shouldn't download this.
